title: Register VerificationAgent and TestingAgent in ICGL registry in backend/governan...
decision:
Register VerificationAgent and TestingAgent in ICGL registry in backend/governance/icgl.py:

1. Add imports at the top (after line 25):
   from ..agents.verification import VerificationAgent
   from ..agents.testing import TestingAgent

2. In _register_internal_agents method (around line 99-107), update agents list:
   agents = [
       ArchitectAgent(),
       BuilderAgent(),
       FailureAgent(),
       PolicyAgent(),
       ConceptGuardian(),
       SentinelAgent(self.sentinel),
       CodeSpecialist(),
       VerificationAgent(),  # NEW
       TestingAgent(),  # NEW
   ]

This makes the new agents available in the system and visible in UI.

full_context:
Register VerificationAgent and TestingAgent in ICGL registry in backend/governance/icgl.py:

1. Add imports at the top (after line 25):
   from ..agents.verification import VerificationAgent
   from ..agents.testing import TestingAgent

2. In _register_internal_agents method (around line 99-107), update agents list:
   agents = [
       ArchitectAgent(),
       BuilderAgent(),
       FailureAgent(),
       PolicyAgent(),
       ConceptGuardian(),
       SentinelAgent(self.sentinel),
       CodeSpecialist(),
       VerificationAgent(),  # NEW
       TestingAgent(),  # NEW
   ]

This makes the new agents available in the system and visible in UI.
